Looking to make a new enquiry or booking in a Dirty Martini bar?
Click here

Want to get in touch with the team at Dirty Martini? Fill out the form below the lost property section and we'll be in touch as soon as possible.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you still accept cash?
What is your dress code?
What are your usual opening hours?
If I need to cancel a booking, will I get my deposit back?
Do you offer a happy hour?
Does Dirty Martini sell gift cards?
Do I have to book a table or can I walk in?
What is your music policy?
Do Dirty Martini bars have disabled access?
Do you allow under 18s into your bars?
How do I contact you about lost property?
How can I get a job at Dirty Martini?
